message.content:
"""

def test_parse_instruction():
    from nlu import Instantiator
    inst = Instantiator()
    inst.from_str(test_instructions)
    assert len(inst.instructions) == 1, "Should have read one instruction"
    i = inst.instructions[0]
    assert i.sentence == 'when I was 6, my sister was half my age. Now I am 80. How old is my sister now?'
    assert len(i.slots) == 1, "Should have read one slot"
    s = i.slots[0]
    assert s.name == 'age'
    assert s.type == 'int'
    assert s.range == (6,80), "Should have parsed age range"
    assert len(i.variables) == 2, "should have read two variables"
    v = i.variables[1]
    assert v.name == 'sister', "should have read sister variable"
    assert v.type == 'int'
    assert v.range == (6,80), "Should have parsed age range"
